preQuizHtml:
Replace strings are expected to work on feedback text, pre-upgrade html, pre-downgrade html, and the post-quiz HTML page.

replace string tests:

  • Downgrade Pool: #{downgradePool}
  • Current Pool Name: #{currentPool}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Feedback and PreUpgrade/Downgrade]
  • Upgrade Pool: #{upgradePool}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Feedback and PreUpgrade/Downgrade]
  • Remaining questions until upgrading to next pool: #{numRemainingToUpgrade}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Feedback and PreUpgrade/Downgrade]
  • Remaining questions until downgrading: #{numRemainingToDowngrade}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Feedback and PreUpgrade/Downgrade]
  • Highest level achieved: #{highestLevelAchieved}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in post-quiz HTML]
  • Ending level: #{endingLevel}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Post-quiz HTML]
postQuizHtml:
The quiz ended. Enjoy the above video. :)

Your highest level was: #{highestLevelAchieved}

Your ending level was: #{endingLevel}

Welcome to the adaptive quiz. This quiz has various levels in it. You will start with some easy questions, and if you do well, the questions will become more difficult. Try to make it to Level 3!

    [ ‚Üë Should work in post-quiz HTML]
  • Ending level: #{endingLevel}
    [ ‚Üë Should work in Post-quiz HTML]

questions.questionHtml: Which planet's atmosphere is composed mostly of Nitrogen?

options.feedback:
No, Pluto is not a planet. It's our home, Earth!

questions.questionHtml: The speed of light in a vaccuum (c) is 1,080,000,000 km/h.
questions.hintHtml: He had one son, and one daughter.

options.feedback:
Correct! The speed of light is a constant 1,080,000,000 km/h (299,792,458 m/s) in a vaccuum.

questions.questionHtml:
Match the terrestrial planets with the number of moons they have.
[Randomize options is on.]
questions.feedbackForPerfect:
Yes! Mars and Earth have moons. Mars with two, and Earth with one. Mercury and Venus don't have any moons! üëç

questionPools.feedbackOnUpgradeHtml:
Good job on passing level 1! The quiz is now about to show you some tougher questions.
If you get one wrong, you'll be downgraded back to level 1, so be careful!
questionPools.feedbackOnDowngradeHtml: You are about to be downgraded to level 0...

questions.questionHtml: The largest moon in our solar system has an atmosphere that is denser than the atmosphere of Mars. The name of this moon is:
questions.hintHtml: He had one son, and one daughter.

That's correct!

questions.questionHtml:
Match the terrestrial planets with the number of moons they have.
[Randomize options is on.]
questions.feedbackForPerfect:
Yes! Mars and Earth have moons. Mars with two, and Earth with one. Mercury and Venus don't have any moons! üëç

questions.questionHtml:
Place a checkmark beside the Gas Giant the planets.

[Please note that Coloured feedback is OFF for this quiz.]
questions.feedbackForPerfect:
Correct! The rocky planets are Earth, Mercury, Venus, and Mars. Jupiter, Neptune, Saturn, and Uranus are all gas giants.
